law.catch_line: Form of warehouse receipt -- Effect of omission.

text.section: A warehouse receipt need not be in any particular form.

A warehouse may insert in its receipt any terms that are not contrary to the Uniform Commercial Code and do not impair its obligation of delivery under KRS 355.7-403 or its duty of care under KRS 355.7-204. Any contrary provisions are ineffective.

law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 8, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 7-202, effective July 1, 1960.
